content.raw:
Hi John,

What the tutorial and sample code is trying to say is that given a synchronized control loop at 200Hz (sim-time), the synchronization mechanism and default budget parameters work well with a controller that does its computations within 2ms real-time duration (assuming simulation is running exactly 1X real-time).  The [Work thread](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/893e390bcd2ed9182f87584103bc328bd625b779/ros/atlas_msgs/pub_atlas_command.cpp?at=default#cl-49) is not meant to be closed in a 500Hz loop .  Hope that makes sense... sorry for the confusion.
